item.description:
Let's continue this standing meetup while Rebekah is away.
You're welcome to join us for a fun easy going get together. No pressure to speak completely in Portuguese. You can get comfortable by just listening then jump in when you're ready to talk.

Sometime ago in separate conversations Ramzi and Alvaro suggested we
provide simple lessons during the Portuguese Table. I thought we could play a game which can also serve as an ice breaker. Each person has five cards and the object of the game is to be the person with the most cards after five statements have been made, in Portuguese of course. The statement is "I have never...." and then you complete the sentence. For example, "I have never learned how to fly a plane." or "Nunca aprendi como voar um avi√£o." Then those who know how to fly a plane would put a card in the middle of the table. Then the next person will say "I have never...." and so on and so on. You're not required to take part, you're welcome to have individual conversations.

Feel free to eat while we chat. Here are the menus for food and beer.

There will NOT be a group bill. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go since people will be arriving and leaving at various times.
item.how_to_find_us: High tables under stained glass. Look for gold star & Portuguese Table signage.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Table
